key_risks: Intense competition in cybersecurity and enterprise software markets
Revenue volatility due to transition from hardware to software
Dependence on the automotive sector for IoT revenue
Cybersecurity threats requiring continuous R&D investment
Ongoing legal disputes such as Pearlstein v. BlackBerry Ltd.
controversies: Pearlstein v. BlackBerry Ltd. litigation involving withheld documents and attorney-client privilege disputes
social_issues: Cybersecurity leadership in preventing over 5.2 million attacks
Launch of AI-powered cybersecurity solutions to address talent shortages
